WRITING.TEXT: "Same thing we do every night Pinky... Try to take over the world!"
I get that man, watching Ben makes we wanna get more into skating transition. He just has that raw energy and you can tell he is having a blast doing it. Infectious shit for sure!

WRITING.TITLE: Ben Raybourns In Transition part. This kid is f*cking fearless

WRITING.TEXT: Pretty disgraceful that homosexuality is still such a hush hush topic within the metal community. Help me get this upvoted to let people know that we metalheads are a respectful and open minded tribe!

WRITING.TITLE: (X-post) The Dillinger Escape Plan releases "gayest t-shirt ever" as a big middle finger to their homophobic fans.
